attributes.action: Reverse Government Policy  to remove resident Wardensin Sheltered Housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RESIDENTIAL WARDENS MAKE LIFE WORTH LIVING for  elderly people in  sheltered housing, and  create a worthwhile social environment. We need to change the Government policy of taking away residential  staff  in favour of  travelling wardens who do not know the residents or their needs and can't act urgently.
